column4: irivers are nice, but for the price of 1 gig i can get 4 on an ipod... bleh
what really pissed me off about mtv... as if it weren't stupid enough that they had to make mtv2 just to show music videos... then they start showing shows on mtv2
of course i didn't really like them before all that... but still... that was really asinine
i prefer to download stuff nowadays... i don't even have my tv plugged in
it's like i can watch mtv for a few days hoping to see the music video i want... or i can download it and watch it now and as often as i want
is the iriver really that much more expensive?
yeah me too... but if they get around to that i may put ubuntu on this box when i get my new hard drive
if they get around to llvm at install time?
it's nice when kde boots in like 3 seconds though
yeah... i see ubuntu as debian ... just with updates
